author: Christianna Silva
title: As Coronavirus Spreads Among Juvenile Justice Facilities, Activists Are Calling For Their Release
description: Since the COVID-19 has swept across the country, everyday lives of kids in juvenile justice facilities are changing: School is no longer in session in-person; volunteers aren’t going into the facility; and the kids are afraid. Activists are calling for their …
content: Every weekday morning, the boys wake up at 7 a.m. in their shared, open-floor rooms at the Rogue Valley Youth Correctional Facility in Oregon. Usually, theyd get ready for their day and walk to the nearby six-room school, where they would join about 65 other … [+10544 chars]
